weekly_report.subject: This week I focused on Project #7 and #9: TABIND Scrabble Project and FizzBuzz Project. Also, I watched several videos talking about the introduction of uv and its efficiency in python

process.2025-06-30: Start the first meeting with Verbus and other interns. Also watched videos about uv package and take a look at top 10 Django App examples
process.2025-07-01: Finished the FizzBuzz project and shared with other interns
process.2025-06-02: Introduced scrabble project and started using python to finish it. Got different numbers of scrabble words in total since each intern has different scrabble dictionary.
process.2025-06-03: Introduced 4-gallon project and shared thoughts about how to get 4 gallons, start doing this project in python.

weekly_report.plan_next_week: Next week I will finish 4-gallon project and watched more videos to get more familiar with python
